import React from "react"; import Button from "../components/Button"; import SmallImg from "../components/SmallImg"; const ItemPage = (props) => { const itemId = props.match.params.id; const item = props.clothes.find((item) => item.name.includes(itemId)); return ( <>

{item.price}

{item.name}

{item.description}

Color:

Pink

); }; export default ItemPage;
